name: amunet_phone_center
description: Full-stack AI receptionist and booking SaaS. Handles calls, chat, scheduling, and billing with Twilio, OpenAI, Stripe, and ElevenLabs.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build

author: Paul Dillon (Amunet AI)
